title: Designing In-Depth Biology Concept Learning Through AR-Based Inquiry Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of cell structure, photosynthesis, and basic ecosystem concepts
context.additional_context: Job-linked biology education program for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 3D structure and functions of cell organelles using AR content
Learners can simulate and analyze variables in the photosynthesis process through inquiry activities in augmented reality environments
Ecosystem models can be recreated using AR to derive interaction patterns among organisms

resources: AR Educational Apps (3D Cell, Plant AR, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
